Package org.hkijena.acaq5.extensions.standardtableoperations.ui.tableoperations

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConvertToNumericBooleanVectorOperation
    Vector operation that converts a number > 0 into 1, and strings "true" into 1 otherwise values are converted to 0
    ConvertToNumericFactorOperation
    Converts contents into numeric representations
    ConvertToNumericVectorOperation
    Ensures that all values are numbers.
    ConvertToOccurrencesVectorOperation
    Converts the vector into a histogram vector
    StatisticsAverageVectorOperation
    Calculates the average
    StatisticsCountNonNullVectorOperation
    Counts all non-null and non-empty entries
    StatisticsCountVectorOperation
    Counts the number of vector entries
    StatisticsMaxVectorOperation
    Finds the maximum of entries
    StatisticsMedianVectorOperation
    Calculates the median
    StatisticsMinVectorOperation
    Finds the minimum value
    StatisticsSumVectorOperation
    Calculates the sum
    StatisticsVarianceVectorOperation
    Calculates the variance
